mapper.insert: insert into PMApprate (id,createdate,modifydate,app_id,channel_type,rate_type,rate,minimum_amount,maximum_amount,settlement_interval,modify_user) values (#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{channelType, jdbcType=CHAR},#{rateType, jdbcType=CHAR},#{rate, jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{minimumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{maximumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{settlementInterval, jdbcType=CHAR},#{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * , case when rate_type = '0' then #{orderFee}*rate when rate_type = '1' then rate end as countRate from PMApprate where app_id = #{appId} and #{orderFee} > minimum_amount and #{orderFee}<= maximum_amount order by countRate limit 1

update PMApprate set id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT},createdate = #{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},modifydate = #{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT},channel_type = #{channelType, jdbcType=CHAR},rate_type = #{rateType, jdbcType=CHAR},rate = #{rate, jdbcType=DECIMAL},minimum_amount = #{minimumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER},maximum_amount = #{maximumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER},settlement_interval = #{settlementInterval, jdbcType=CHAR},modify_user = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `pmapprate` (`createdate`, `modifydate`, `app_id`, `channel_type`, `rate_type`, `rate`, `minimum_amount`, `maximum_amount`,`modify_user`) VALUES (sysdate(),sysdate(),#{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rateType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rate, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minimumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maximumAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{modifyUser, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: delete from pmapprate where id =#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id,rate,rate_type rateType,minimum_amount minimumAmount,maximum_amount maximumAmount from PMApprate where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id,app_id appId,channel_type channelType,rate_type rateType,rate,minimum_amount minimumAmount,maximum_amount maximumAmount from PMApprate where app_id = #{_parameter, jdbcType=BIGINT} order by minimum_amount

select count(1) from pmappratebak p
and p.app_id = #{id}
